episode.title: Don’t Tap the Monkey
episode.rawTitle: 213: ‘Don’t Tap the Monkey’ With John Moltz
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: John Moltz returns to the show. We talk about the HomePod, the “cancellation” of iPhone X, Steve Jobs and the orange button, and Super Bowl 52. And a surprising amount of talk about dates.
episode.showNotes:
John Moltz returns to the show. We talk about the HomePod, the “cancellation” of iPhone X, Steve Jobs and the orange button, and Super Bowl 52. And a surprising amount of talk about dates.
